body_html:
https://github.com/Alexpux/mingw-w64/blob/b028d1b994ab601843a518a2e4ad0d74a05e9569/mingw-w64-crt/misc/mkstemp.c seems to be licensed under ZPL

Looks like it to me as well, but we'd have to have a lawyer verify that this is the case and that it's compatible with Apache 2.

Finding someone to reimplement from scratch seems easier to me personally.

Alternatively, perhaps we could rework the hlo graph dumper not to rely on mkstemps?

Looks like it to me as well, but we'd have to have a lawyer verify that this is the case and that it's compatible with Apache 2.
Finding someone to reimplement from scratch seems easier to me personally.
Alternatively, perhaps we could rework the hlo graph dumper not to rely on mkstemps?

> https://github.com/Alexpux/mingw-w64/blob/b028d1b994ab601843a518a2e4ad0d74a05e9569/mingw-w64-crt/misc/mkstemp.c seems to be licensed under ZPL

Looks like it to me as well, but we'd have to have a lawyer verify that this is the case and that it's compatible with Apache 2.

Finding someone to reimplement from scratch seems easier to me personally.

Alternatively, perhaps we could rework the hlo graph dumper not to rely on mkstemps?
